artist: Author: Chelsea Ray Lea; Publisher: Chelsea Ray Lea , Athens, Ga.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photocopied image of two mermaid figures flanking various designs, with text printed in xerography on lavender wove paper covers; 42 pp.
inscription: Inside of front cover, red ink pen: TO: FLY / YOU ROCK!!!
title: Mermaidia Bomb, no. 42
